title: ‘Survivor’: Season 41, Episode 2
description:
This week, Tyson Apostol is joined by fact-checker Riley McAtee to recap the latest episode. They discuss which changes to the show they like and give their thoughts on the Beware Advantage twist. Plus an update on their ‘Survivor’ beards and this week’s superlatives.
Host: Tyson Apostol
Guest: Riley McAtee
Editor: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
